programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: The Strangest Things Ever Stolen
programme.desc: More than money makes the crime world go round. You won’t believe the odd array of goods that have been stolen over the years -- and the motivations behind the thefts.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: City Girl’s Rapid Outdoor Initiation
programme.desc: Recent college grad Trina Pham was raised in Greenville, SC, and loves her hometown. But now, it's time for this overachieving engineer to move beyond the city limits and get out into the world around her before embarking on her career.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Secrets & Surprises in Fresno, CA
programme.desc: Word is this surprising city has a literary speakeasy. Meet a father-daughter duo who is disrupting the local food scene. Explore a historic man cave and pluck fruit from a tree that grows lemons and oranges. Also: archery! And, pancakes!

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: Frank Nicotero takes to the streets to ask people about the wildest, wackiest news stories. In "Odd Jobs," contestants learn about a kid-run food truck, a school board member with a special license and a senior citizen that's into heavy work.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Botched Crimes
programme.desc: Sometimes, would-be criminals are their own worst enemies. This episode highlights crime “fails,” and the officers - and ordinary civilians - who save the day.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: Weeks after a pregnant woman is shot and killed in Orlando, a shootout between her suspected killer and a police officer sparks a manhunt.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: One vacation. Two teens. Thousands of text messages. What sounds like the beginnings of a typical modern romance turns to tragedy–and controversy–for a coastal Massachusetts town.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Endearing Dater is Ready for His Perfect Match
programme.desc: Maxwell, a young professional, is taking a chance on love with three blind dates. Will things get playful with Hannah, stay sweet with Kambree or will Maxwell cross the finish line with Paige?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Pranks of Kindness and Fulfilling a Dream for an Old Friend
programme.desc: Davin hits the streets in his new tree costume and attempts to jump-scare passersby. Ryan then offers them a chance to win money by answering trivia questions. Later, Justin surprises an old friend with a rare cat she has dreamt of owning for years.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Give Into Temptation In Cape Cod, MA
programme.desc: Let a naughty mermaid be your guide to a finger-licking, dune-humping, lobster-rolling, ghost-hunting good time in this charming and historic seaside community. This is The Cape.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: What's On The Menu, Pittsburgh?: Food Trucks
programme.desc: Pittsburgh loves its food trucks. Get to know some of the owners and chefs braving the cold to bring warm treats to people all over the city.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the 'Burgh: Nailing It In Carnegie
programme.desc: Ed and Day get competitive over a round of golf and learn a new twist on old fashion cocktail making before heading to Apis Meadery in Carnegie.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Old School Classics From The Midwest that Stood the Test of Time
programme.desc: Indulge in the old-school classics that have reigned in the Midwest for decades. From Wisconsin cheese curds to Kansas City's burnt ends, enjoy these unique comfort foods that are as timeless as they are tasty.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: A Single Father's Life-Saving Last Act
programme.desc: Single father Kendal Fenwick is the 295th homicide in Baltimore in 2015. Family and investigators wonder whether his efforts to curb drugs and violence in his neighborhood made him a target. Or is it something else entirely?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Date Night Delights
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Taylor and Adam Stayrook will have to chef to impress in today’s Date Night Delights challenge. Will their fancy meals delight the judges? Or will this be a date they wanna forget?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Don’t Cave Into The Pressure
programme.desc: Ivan Gomez is on a weight loss journey, but it’s one that’s been limited to exercising in his home. Kinga meets Ivan in Stockton, CA to show him how the outdoors can be a personal gym for body, mind and spirit.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Fancy in Back Bay
programme.desc: Rob discovers amazing antiques, grills some top-notch steak, tours an animal shelter and serves drinks in one of Boston’s poshest neighborhoods.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: All in the Family
programme.desc: Patrick Shea, Chef and Owner of CK Pearl and Decklyns in Essex and Gloucester and Chef Kladji Plaku, Chef de Cuisine at City Table, City Barn & Solas in Boston engage in a battle of culinary skill. Will a surprise guest judge change everything?

programme.title: My Amazing Cheap Date
programme.sub-title: Cheap Date: Street Meats & Fitness Feats
programme.desc: Two couples sample bites from around the world, cozy up in nature, get hopped up on caffeine and seek out a yoga glow on two blind dates in Orlando.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: The Competing Couple
programme.desc: A show first! A woman and her boyfriend each try their hand at Frank Nicotero's trivia questions to see who can win the most money.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.desc: Host Dave Holmes meets celebrity guests at the airport bar to discuss must-do activities in cities across America. So when you’re ready to board your next flight, you’ll have an Esquire-approved itinerary.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.desc: From professional hockey players to award-winning muralists, The Spark highlights the craft, the journey, and the joy. These masters and thought leaders may have made names for themselves on the national stage, but they never forget the city that sparks their inspiration daily

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: On The Job
programme.desc: Orlando expert, Brendan O'Connor, celebrates the people behind the scenes of the businesses that make Orlando a truly unique place. Join him as he rolls up his sleeves and receives hands on training while spending a day with them, On The Job.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Stitch
programme.desc: Stitch showcases the feel-good and do-good that make up the fabric of America from inspiring tales of perseverance, to good Samaritans helping neighbors, to trailblazers improving their communities.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Super Rare Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: From a 300-year-old violin valued at $6 million, to thousands of rare books, thieves will go to wild, even dangerous, lengths to snatch up irreplaceable treasures. For investigators, it's a race against the clock to recover these priceless valuables.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?
